metadata.dc:description: Aphallia had an incidence of 1/30.000.000 newborn. This is a rare genitourinary anomaly derived from a faulty development of the genital tubercles. It usually coexists with series of other anomalies which are incompatible with normal life. This article presents a description of a 2 years old patient.
metadata.dc:title: Afalia asociada a fístula recto-uretral: reporte de un caso.
[Aphallia associated to urethrorectal fistula: a case report].
metadata.dc:publisher: Cirugia pediatrica : organo oficial de la Sociedad Espanola de Cirugia Pediatrica
